title: Bestow curse
content:
Bestow Curse Level 3 Necromancy Spell Curse a creature with your touch. The curse either bestows Disadvantage on checks and Saving Throws or attacks, lets you deal additional damage to the target, or robs it of its actions. 10 turns MeleeWIS Save Concentration Action Level 3 Spell Slot
